subject: Collaboration Request
description_text:
Hello,

I run a Youtube Channel that is dedicated to sim racing, called the Older
Gamers Perspective <https://www.youtube.com/@OlderGamersPerspective/videos>,
and I have been asked by a number of viewers of this channel to review your
products.

The product that seems to be a good fit for me to review is the Simsonn Pro
X Ultra Sim Racing Pedal. Mostly because I am currently using a T-LCM pedal
set, as I believe many people are, and your pedals would represent the
perfect upgrade.

If you are interested in sending me a review copy, please note that I am
based in Germany, and my full details are below.

Best

Paul

Paul Ekert
Schlehdornweg 6
Braunschweig
38122
Germany

+49 1578 731 1894

conversations.body_text:
Hi,
Just to follow up on this, the tracking number you gave me was for a parcel
sent to Gatineau in Canada, and I am in Germany.

Did you give me the wrong tracking number?

Best

Paul Ekert


On Thu, 11 Sept 2025 at 09:43, service@simsonn.com
